subject: feat: extend role-based view levels to all dashboard tabs
body:
Extended view level support to remaining sections:

Health tab:
- Urgency/Impact by Contributor adapts to view level
- Executive: single aggregated bar with percentages
- Management: grouped by repo with click-to-drill
- Developer: individual contributors (original)

Security tab:
- Executive: count and date range summary only
- Management: per-repo breakdown cards
- Developer: full commit details (original)

Timeline:
- Executive: weekly period summaries with tag breakdown
- Management: daily period summaries with tag breakdown
- Developer: individual commit list (original)
- Period cards are clickable to open detail pane

Tags/Progress tabs already worked via openDetailPane changes.
title: extend role-based view levels to all dashboard tabs
